text: Gotthilf Fischer (11 February 1928 – 11 December 2020) was a German choir and orchestra director. He was known for founding Fischer-Chöre, a choir in Germany. Fischer was born in Plochingen, Weimar Republic. He won first prize in the Swabian-Alemannic Fastnacht, which let to the foundation of the Fischer-Chöre. Fischer died on 11 December 2020 in Weinstadt, Germany at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German conductors
title: Gotthilf Fischer
